location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

principalId.description: The principal ID of the assigned identity.

clientId.description: The client ID of the assigned identity.

sourceResourceId.description: Defines the ID of the connector's source resource.

errors.description: Indicates any errors on the connector resource.

code.description: Service specific error code which serves as the substatus for the HTTP error code.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

properties.description: Defines the backup connection properties for a virtual instance for SAP.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

backupData.description: Information about the recovery services vault and backup policy used for backup.

errors.description: Defines the errors related to backup connection resource of virtual instance for SAP.

recoveryServicesVault.description: The properties of the recovery services vault used for backup.

id.description: The resource ID of the recovery services vault that has been created.

vaultType.description: The vault type, whether it is existing or has to be created.

name.description: The name of the recovery services vault has to be created.

resourceGroup.description: The name of the resource group where the recovery services vault has to be created.

vaultType.description: The vault type, whether it is existing or has to be created.

sslConfiguration.description: Path of the SSL key store.

backupPolicy.description: Defines the policy properties for database backup.

hdbuserstoreKeyName.description: Name of the HANA Database User Store Key.

instanceNumber.description: Gets or sets the database instance number.

dbInstanceSnapshotBackupPolicy.description: Defines the policy properties for database backup.

backupType.description: The type of backup, VM, SQL or HANA.

sslKeyStore.description: Specify the name of the keystore file that contains the client's identity (eg. sapsrv.pse). The script will search for the file in the appropriate directory depending on the crypto provider mentioned. If this argument is not provided, it is automatically determined by searching in the configuration files.

sslTrustStore.description: Specify the name of the trust store file that contains the serverâ€™s public certificates (eg. sapsrv.pse). The script will search for the file in the appropriate directory depending on the crypto provider mentioned. If this argument is not provided, it is automatically determined by searching in the configuration files.

sslHostNameInCertificate.description: Specify the hostname as mentioned in the SSL certificate. If this argument is not provided, it is automatically determined by searching in the SSL certificate.

sslCryptoProvider.description: Specify the crypto provider being used (commoncrypto/openssl). If this argument is not provided, it is automatically determined by searching in the configuration files.

name.description: The name of the DB backup policy.

workLoadType.description: Type of workload for the backup management

settings.description: Common settings for the backup management

subProtectionPolicy.description: List of sub-protection policies which includes schedule and retention

protectedItemsCount.description: Number of items associated with this policy.

backupManagementType.description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

timeZone.description: TimeZone optional input as string. For example: TimeZone = "Pacific Standard Time".

isCompression.description:
Workload compression flag. This has been added so that 'isSqlCompression'
will be deprecated once clients upgrade to consider this flag.

schedulePolicy.description: Backup schedule specified as part of backup policy.

retentionPolicy.description: Retention policy with the details on backup copy retention ranges.

tieringPolicy.description:
Tiering policy to automatically move RPs to another tier.
Key is Target Tier, defined in RecoveryPointTierType enum.
Tiering policy specifies the criteria to move RP to the target tier.

snapshotBackupAdditionalDetails.description: Hana DB instance snapshot backup additional details.

scheduleFrequencyInMins.description: Frequency of the log schedule operation of this policy in minutes.

schedulePolicyType.description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.
This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

scheduleRunFrequency.description: Frequency of the schedule operation of this policy.

scheduleRunDays.description: List of days of week this schedule has to be run.

scheduleRunTimes.description: List of times of day this schedule has to be run.

scheduleWeeklyFrequency.description: At every number weeks this schedule has to be run.

schedulePolicyType.description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

interval.description:
Interval at which backup needs to be triggered. For hourly the value
 can be 4/6/8/12

scheduleWindowStartTime.description: To specify start time of the backup window

scheduleWindowDuration.description: To specify duration of the backup window

scheduleRunFrequency.description: Frequency of the schedule operation of this policy.

schedulePolicyType.description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

scheduleRunTimes.description: List of times of day this schedule has to be run.
List of times of day this schedule has to be run.

dailySchedule.description: Daily retention schedule of the protection policy.

weeklySchedule.description: Weekly retention schedule of the protection policy.

monthlySchedule.description: Monthly retention schedule of the protection policy.

yearlySchedule.description: Yearly retention schedule of the protection policy.

retentionPolicyType.description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

count.description:
Count of duration types. Retention duration is obtained by the counting the duration type Count times.
For example, when Count = 3 and DurationType = Weeks, retention duration will be three weeks.

durationType.description: Retention duration type of retention policy.

daysOfTheWeek.description: List of days of week for weekly retention policy.

retentionScheduleFormatType.description: Retention schedule format type for monthly retention policy.

retentionScheduleDaily.description: Daily retention format for monthly retention policy.

retentionScheduleWeekly.description: Weekly retention format for monthly retention policy.

daysOfTheMonth.description: List of days of the month.

isLast.description: Whether Date is last date of month

daysOfTheWeek.description: List of days of the week.

retentionScheduleFormatType.description: Retention schedule format for yearly retention policy.

monthsOfYear.description: List of months of year of yearly retention policy.

retentionScheduleDaily.description: Daily retention format for yearly retention policy.

retentionScheduleWeekly.description: Weekly retention format for yearly retention policy.

retentionDuration.description: Retention duration of the protection policy.

retentionPolicyType.description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

tieringMode.description:
Tiering Mode to control automatic tiering of recovery points. Supported values are:
1. TierRecommended: Tier all recovery points recommended to be tiered
2. TierAfter: Tier all recovery points after a fixed period, as specified in duration + durationType below.
3. DoNotTier: Do not tier any recovery points

duration.description:
Number of days/weeks/months/years to retain backups in current tier before tiering.
Used only if TieringMode is set to TierAfter

durationType.description:
Retention duration type: days/weeks/months/years
Used only if TieringMode is set to TierAfter

instantRpRetentionRangeInDays.description: Retention range for instant Rp in days.

instantRPDetails.description: Instant RP details for the snapshot.

userAssignedManagedIdentityDetails.description: User Assigned managed identity details used for snapshot policy.

backupPolicy.description: Defines the policy properties for database backup.

backupType.description: The type of backup, VM, SQL or HANA.

backupPolicy.description: Defines the policy properties for virtual machine backup.

diskExclusionProperties.description: Defines the disk exclusion properties for virtual machine backup.

name.description: The name of the VM Backup policy.

schedulePolicy.description: Backup schedule specified as part of backup policy.

retentionPolicy.description: Retention policy with the details on backup copy retention ranges.

tieringPolicy.description:
Tiering policy to automatically move RPs to another tier
Key is Target Tier, defined in RecoveryPointTierType enum.
Tiering policy specifies the criteria to move RP to the target tier.

instantRpRetentionRangeInDays.description: Instant RP retention policy range in days

timeZone.description: Time zone optional input as string. For example: "Pacific Standard Time".

protectedItemsCount.description: Number of items associated with this policy.

backupManagementType.description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

azureBackupRGNamePrefix.description: Azure backup resource group name prefix.

azureBackupRGNameSuffix.description: Azure backup resource group name suffix.

diskLunList.description: List of Disks' Logical Unit Numbers (LUN) to be used for VM Protection.

isInclusionList.description: Flag to indicate whether DiskLunList is to be included/ excluded from backup.
